questions.question: 1. Which part of optical microscope gather lights and focussed it on the specimen to be viewed?
2. Resolving power of a microscope does not depend on _________

answers.b: Medium in which objective lens is immersed

questions.question: 3. Total magnification of optical microscope is obtained by________

answers.a: Magnification power of objective and condenser lenses
answers.b: Magnification power of only condenser lens
answers.d: Magnification power of eyepiece and objective lenses

questions.question: 4. What part of the optical microscope regulates how much light enters the viewing area?
5. Which component of an optical microscope will aid to achieve a clear image if an observer's eyes have some vision difference?
6. Which of the following color lights will provide the greatest resolution?
